sentences.en: Furthermore his favoured position is left - wing, where Ashley Young excelled.
sentences.cn: 并且在他喜欢的左翼位置, 阿什利-杨表现更出色.

sentences.en: Furthermore, as Gervaise was quick to point out, Mr Scully was not a detective.
sentences.cn: 而且，正如热尔韦斯毫不犹豫地指出来的那样，斯库利先生并不是一名侦探。

sentences.en: Furthermore, dragline silk is elastic, which many of the man - made fibers are not.
sentences.cn: 而且, 牵引丝具有弹性, 这是许多人造纤维所不具备的.
而且, 也出现了外在化问题.

sentences.en: Furthermore, he felt that he wasn't really an authority on preventive medicine.
sentences.cn: 此外, 他觉得自己并不真正是预防医学的权威.

sentences.en: Furthermore, many agencies'responsibilities extend beyond the enforcement of existing laws and rules.
sentences.cn: 此外, 很多机关的责任扩大得超过了执行现有的法律和规则.

sentences.en: Furthermore, subsidies provide incentives only for investments in equipment.
sentences.cn: 更有甚者, 提供津贴仅是为鼓励增添设备的投资.

sentences.en: Furthermore, the book incorporates a number of important pedagogical innovations.
sentences.cn: 此外, 本书在教学方法上有许多重要革新.

sentences.en: Furthermore, there are far more healthy carriers of enteric pathogens than frank clinical cases.
sentences.cn: 而且健康的肠道病原菌携带者又比明显的临床患者多得多.

sentences.en: Furthermore, there is a marked absence of peer pressure here, which would make itself palpably felt when such anti - social conduct occurs.
sentences.cn: 再者, 本地明显缺乏同辈人之间的压力, 致使不良行为发生时,众人浑然不觉其不妥.

sentences.en: Furthermore, they claim that any such interference is completely ineffective.
sentences.cn: 此外，他们还声称任何这样的干预都是完全无效的。

sentences.en: Furthermore, we gathered leather and feather for the future colder weather.
sentences.cn: 而且，我们收集了皮革和羽毛以应付将来更冷的天气。

sentences.en: Furthermore. I'm angry with myself. Why am I so restrained and artless in my speech?
sentences.cn: 我并且生气我自己: 怎么我只会那样拘束,不调皮的在应对?

sentences.en: He is old and unpopular. Furthermore, he has at best only two years of political life ahead of him.
sentences.cn: 他年纪已老，又不得人心，而且他最多也只有两年的政治生命了。

sentences.en: I don't like her because she is too tall and furthermore she smokes too much.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢她,因为她太高,另外她抽烟太厉害.

sentences.en: They are a long way off from here, and furthermore they're making good soldiers.
sentences.cn: 他们离开这里远得很呢, 而且他们倒都做了好士兵了.

trans.tran_cn: 此外，而且，与此同时，再者
trans.tran_en: in addition to what has already been said
